title: Drawing, "Pattern of Horse Shoes, Textile Design (2 of 2)", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.

Drawing, "Pattern of Horse Shoes, Textile Design (2 of 2)", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-74.
